biotools.summary: A pipeline for automated configuration and processing of diffusion MRI data. iDIO is a software toolkit for processing diffusion-weighted MRI data. It integrates the functionalities of modern MRI software packages to constitute a complete data processing pipeline for structural connectivity analysis of the human brain.

bioschemas.name: iDIO
